snippet.title: Rustler – Release Date Reveal Trailer – Launching August 31
snippet.description:
Wake up in a medieval open-world, and choose violence in Rustler, launching on August 31. Learn more here: http://www.rustlergame.com/  

In Rustler, you’ll play as anti-hero Guy, a brigand determined to win The Grand Tournament for its illustrious prize. Saddle up and prepare to complete quests, terrorize townspeople, shoot cows into the sky, and cause absolute ruckus as a medieval marauder.  

Play it now in Steam early access here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/844260/Rustler_Grand_Theft_Horse  

Follow Us on Twitter: http://modus.games/twitter  
Like Us on Facebook: http://modus.games/facebook  
Join our Discord: http://modus.games/discord
